text: Ani allaha jyala marga dakhavila, to margadarsana labhalela ahe ani jyala to pathabhrasta karila tara asambhava ahe ki tumhala tyaca mitra, tyacyakherija dusara koni adhalela, asa lokanna amhi kayamatacya divasi tondaghasi paduna asa avastheta jama karu ki te andhale, muke ani bahire asatila. Tyance thikana jahannama asela, jevha ti (aga) thodi sud'dha manda padu lagela tara tila amhi tyancyasathi anakhi bhadakavuna de'u
